title: Answer Product Compatibility Question
description: A customer asks if a specific camera lens is compatible with their camera model.

tasks.description: Identify the camera lens and camera body the customer is asking about.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the two products.

tasks.description: Search the internal knowledge base or manufacturer's specifications for compatibility information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a compatibility chart confirming the lens works with the camera.

tasks.description: Clearly inform the customer that the products are compatible.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a correct and confident answer to the customer.
